name: Neon Showdown
description:
Hello!

This is an entrance for my first game jam. As the theme was mixing two genres I decided to make a turn-based strategy/top-down shooter.

The game has 2 gamemodes:

Player vs Player - Take turns against another player locally trying to shoot each other. The first one to shoot the opponent 3 times wins.

Singleplayer: - Battle against waves of enemyes that charge towards you each round.

Instructions:

Player1: 

-Rotate clockwise/counterclockwise: A/D

-Shoot/Recoil: W

Player2:

-Rotate clockwise/counterclockwise: LeftArrowKey/RightArrowKey

-Shoot/Recoil: UpArrowKey

Escape: Exit the game.

Use rotation to aim and shooting mechanic to gain points/move with recoil.

The game lacks a soundtrack and valid sound and visual effects. I intend to provide these as well as improve the mechanics of the game all-around.
